title: BBC Women's Football Weekly
body_text:
Episode details
Radio 5 Live,22 Jan 2026,44 mins
Extra: Arsenal special with Kim Little, Beth Mead & Renee Slegers!
BBC Women's Football WeeklyAvailable for 6 days
The Kim Little fan club are all together for this one featuring very special guests...Kim Little and Beth Mead! Ben Haines, Ellen White and Jen Beattie are down at the Arsenal training ground catching up with former teammates and friends captain Kim Little and Beth Mead! Manager Renee Slegers also joins the pod after Arsenal released a documentary about their journey to winning the Champions League last season. Jen with the starring role of doing the voice over for the doc! Kim and Beth chat about how they're feeling on and off the pitch, plus an insight into the communication amongst the team and staff and how that works. Renee reflects on how she stays so calm under pressure and her ambitions as the Arsenal manager. Plus Renee shares an anecdote about how she wasn't always so confident speaking in public!
Programme Website
